project.name: JAXB Tools :: JAXB Basics :: Runtime [old groupId fixed version]
project.description: This is an empty jar to help people with relocation informations and also override org.jvnet.jaxb2_commons:jaxb2-basics-runtime versions below v2 when you have both org.jvnet.jaxb2_commons:jaxb2-basics-runtime and org.jvnet.jaxb:jaxb2-basics-runtime artifacts in the same application
